attributes.additional_details: He’s amazing, he’s helped sooo many people and especially through this tough time with Corona virus, he’s posted regular PE sessions daily for school children.
attributes.background: Honour Joe Wicks for his services to the public.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
